title: CardHeader
description: The card header is the uppermost part of the card that provides important information about the card and its related content on the detail page.

Title.description: Title text to be displayed on the card header.

TitleOnMedia.description: If the value is true, the title is displayed on card media instead of card header.

Subtitle.description: Subtitle text to be displayed on the card header.

DetailImage.description: Image to be displayed in the card. `DetailImage` is displayed over `Icons` if both are defined.

DetailImageIsCircular.description: If the value is true, the `DetailImage` is displayed in a circular shape.

Icons.description: Array of images to be rendered in Icons Stack. Each icon/image size is set to be 16px by 16px. Count of visible images is limited to the count of active labels in the main stack.

CounterText.description: To show the count of displayed items in upcoming card body segment.

ActionButton.description: Supports one specific action and/or multiple actions that directly impact the card.

ExtendedHeaders.description: Contains additional elements that provide more information. These elements can be labels, status, rating controls, tags, text.

anyOf.description: Expects return of `ExtendedHeader` in array format.

Styles.description: Style to be applied on the card.

Title.description: The string value is a style class name for `Title`.

Subtitle.description: The string value is a style class name for `Subtitle`.

DetailImage.description: The string value is a style class name for `DetailImage`.

Icons.description: Supported in iOS only. The string value is a style class name for `Icons`.

CounterText.description: The string value is a style class name for `CounterText`.

Header.description: Supported in iOS only. The string value is a style class name for `Header`. It will apply background color to both `Header` and `ExtendedHeaders`.
